title: Opinion | Here's What 22 Separate Studies Found: Medicare for All Would Cost Less Than the For-Profit Status Quo
meta_description: No matter how you design a single-payer public health insurance system, it would have lower overall health care costs, so long as for-profit private health insurers no longer exist to drive up health care costs.
